items.sentence: All the girls in Tom's class think that Tom is really good-looking.
I don't know the exact date that happened, but it happened in 2013.
Tom didn't want anybody to know that he couldn't understand French.
If you wanted a high paying job, then why did you become a teacher?
Tom has beaten me at tic-tac-toe more times than I'd like to admit.
Our vacation was so much fun that we decided to stay an extra week.
It's almost impossible to learn a foreign language in a short time.
Tom still hasn't found the courage to talk to the kids about death.
Tom cut the article out of the newspaper and sent it to his mother.
The only foreign language that they taught at my school was French.
